00044 using namespace Hypertable;

00048 namespace {
00049 
00050 struct MyPolicy : Config::Policy {
00051   static void init_options() {
00052     cmdline_desc("Usage: %s [options] <table>\n\n"
00053       "  This program counts the number of cells that exist in CellStores\n"
00054       "  for a table.  It does this by reading the Files columns for the\n"
00055       "  table in the METADATA table to learn of all the CellStores.  It\n"
00056       "  then does a linear scan of each CellStore file, counting the\n"
00057       "  number of cells...\nOptions");
00058     cmdline_hidden_desc().add_options()
00059       ("table", str(), "name of the table to scan")
00060       ;
00061     cmdline_positional_desc().add("table", -1);
00062   }
00063 };
00064 
00065 typedef Cons<MyPolicy, DefaultClientPolicy> AppPolicy;
00066 
00067 struct RangeCellStoreInfo {
00068   String start_row;
00069   String end_row;
00070   std::vector<String> cell_stores;
00071 };
00072 
00073 struct CellStoreInfo {
00074   String start_row;
00075   String end_row;
00076   String file;
00077 };
00078 
00079 void
00080 fill_cell_store_vector(ClientPtr &hypertable_client_ptr, const char *table_name,
00081                        std::vector<CellStoreInfo> &file_vector);

00085 
00086 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00087   try {
00088     init_with_policy<AppPolicy>(argc, argv);
00089 
00090     String table_name = get("table", String());
00091 
00092     if (table_name.empty()) {
00093       HT_ERROR_OUT <<"table name is required"<< HT_END;
00094       cout << cmdline_desc() << endl;
00095       return 1;
00096     }
00097 
00098     bool hit_start = false;
00099     uint64_t total_count = 0;
00100     uint64_t store_count = 0;
00101     int timeout = get_i32("DfsBroker.Timeout");
00102 
00103     // Create Hypertable client object
00104     ClientPtr hypertable_client = new Hypertable::Client(argv[0]);
00105     ConnectionManagerPtr conn_mgr = new ConnectionManager();
00106     DfsBroker::Client *dfs = new DfsBroker::Client(conn_mgr, properties);
00107 
00108     if (!dfs->wait_for_connection(timeout)) {
00109       cerr << "error: timed out waiting for DFS broker" << endl;
00110       exit(1);
00111     }
00112 
00113     Global::block_cache = new FileBlockCache(200000000LL);
00114     std::vector<CellStoreInfo> file_vector;
00115 
00116     fill_cell_store_vector(hypertable_client, table_name.c_str(), file_vector);
00117 
00118     ScanContextPtr scan_context_ptr(new ScanContext());
00119     Key key;
00120     ByteString value;
00121 
00122     for (size_t i=0; i<file_vector.size(); i++) {
00126       CellStoreV0Ptr cell_store_ptr = new CellStoreV0(dfs);
00127       CellListScanner *scanner = 0;
00128 
00129       cell_store_ptr->open(file_vector[i].file.c_str(), 0, 0);
00130 
00131       cell_store_ptr->load_index();
00132 
00133       hit_start = (file_vector[i].start_row == "") ? true : false;
00134       store_count = 0;
00135       scanner = cell_store_ptr->create_scanner(scan_context_ptr);
00136 
00137       while (scanner->get(key, value)) {
00138         if (!hit_start) {
00139           if (strcmp(key.row, file_vector[i].start_row.c_str()) <= 0) {
00140             scanner->forward();
00141             continue;
00142           }
00143           hit_start = true;
00144         }
00145         if (strcmp(key.row, file_vector[i].end_row.c_str()) > 0)
00146           break;
00147 
00148         store_count++;
00149         scanner->forward();
00150       }
00151       delete scanner;
00152 
00153       cout << store_count << "\t" << file_vector[i].file << "["
00154            << file_vector[i].start_row << ".." << file_vector[i].end_row << "]"
00155            << endl;
00156       total_count += store_count;
00157     }
00158     cout << total_count << "\tTOTAL" << endl;
00159   }
00160   catch (Exception &e) {
00161     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00162     return 1;
00163   }
00164   return 0;
00165 }

00168 namespace {
00169 
00170 void
00171 fill_cell_store_vector(ClientPtr &hypertable_client_ptr, const char *table_name,
00172                        std::vector<CellStoreInfo> &file_vector) {
00173   TablePtr table_ptr;
00174   TableScannerPtr scanner_ptr;
00175   ScanSpec scan_spec;
00176   RowInterval ri;
00177   Cell cell;
00178   uint32_t table_id;
00179   char start_row[16];
00180   char end_row[16];
00181   RangeCellStoreInfo range_cell_store_info;
00182   CellStoreInfo cell_store_info;
00183 
00184   try {
00185 
00186     // Open the 'METADATA' table
00187     table_ptr = hypertable_client_ptr->open_table("METADATA");
00188 
00189     table_id = hypertable_client_ptr->get_table_id(table_name);
00190 
00191     // Set up the scan specification
00192     scan_spec.max_versions = 1;
00193     sprintf(start_row, "%d:", table_id);
00194     ri.start = start_row;
00195     sprintf(end_row, "%d:%s", table_id, Key::END_ROW_MARKER);
00196     ri.end = end_row;
00197     scan_spec.row_intervals.push_back(ri);
00198     scan_spec.columns.clear();
00199     scan_spec.columns.push_back("Files");
00200     scan_spec.columns.push_back("StartRow");
00201 
00202     // Create a scanner on the 'METADATA' table
00203     scanner_ptr = table_ptr->create_scanner(scan_spec);
00204 
00205   }
00206   catch (std::exception &e) {
00207     cerr << "error: " << e.what() << endl;
00208     exit(1);
00209   }
00210 
00211   range_cell_store_info.start_row = "";
00212   range_cell_store_info.end_row = "";
00213   range_cell_store_info.cell_stores.clear();
00214 
00215   // Iterate through the cells returned by the scanner
00216   while (scanner_ptr->next(cell)) {
00217     if (strcmp(cell.row_key, range_cell_store_info.end_row.c_str())) {
00218       if (range_cell_store_info.end_row != "") {
00219         const char *end_row_cstr =
00220             strchr(range_cell_store_info.end_row.c_str(), ':');
00221         if (end_row_cstr == 0) {
00222           cerr << "error: mal-formed end row (missing colon) - "
00223                << range_cell_store_info.end_row << endl;
00224           exit(1);
00225         }
00226         end_row_cstr++;
00227         cell_store_info.start_row = range_cell_store_info.start_row;
00228         cell_store_info.end_row = end_row_cstr;
00229         for (size_t i=0; i<range_cell_store_info.cell_stores.size(); i++) {
00230           cell_store_info.file = range_cell_store_info.cell_stores[i];
00231           file_vector.push_back(cell_store_info);
00232         }
00233       }
00234       range_cell_store_info.start_row = "";
00235       range_cell_store_info.end_row = cell.row_key;
00236       range_cell_store_info.cell_stores.clear();
00237     }
00238 
00239     if (!strcmp(cell.column_family, "StartRow"))
00240       range_cell_store_info.start_row =
00241           String((const char *)cell.value, cell.value_len);
00242     else if (!strcmp(cell.column_family, "Files")) {
00243       String files = String((const char *)cell.value, cell.value_len);
00244       char *ptr, *save_ptr;
00245       ptr = strtok_r((char *)files.c_str(), "\n\r;", &save_ptr);
00246       while (ptr) {
00247         range_cell_store_info.cell_stores.push_back(ptr);
00248         ptr = strtok_r(0, "\n\r;", &save_ptr);
00249       }
00250     }
00251     else {
00252       cerr << "Unexpected column family encountered: '" << cell.column_family
00253            << endl;
00254       exit(1);
00255     }
00256   }
00257 
00258   if (!range_cell_store_info.cell_stores.empty()) {
00259     const char *end_row_cstr = strchr(range_cell_store_info.end_row.c_str(),
00260                                       ':');
00261     if (end_row_cstr == 0) {
00262       cerr << "error: mal-formed end row (missing colon) - "
00263            << range_cell_store_info.end_row << endl;
00264       exit(1);
00265     }
00266     end_row_cstr++;
00267     cell_store_info.start_row = range_cell_store_info.start_row;
00268     cell_store_info.end_row = end_row_cstr;
00269     for (size_t i=0; i<range_cell_store_info.cell_stores.size(); i++) {
00270       cell_store_info.file = range_cell_store_info.cell_stores[i];
00271       file_vector.push_back(cell_store_info);
00272     }
00273   }
00274 }
00275
